title: Il Etait Une Fois le Cap Horn = One Upon a Time Cape Horn
brief_description: This corporate documentary follows French yachtsman Alain Colas, from the launch of his boat in St Malo to his successful completion of a solo round-the-world journey via Cape Horn.
